div.div: Necrotic ingluvitis lesions and trichomonad parasite morphology.
div.p: (a) Necrotic ingluvitis lesions (arrow) with a characteristic yellow caseous appearance in a greenfinch caused by Trichomonas gallinae infection. (b) Morphology of the greenfinch trichomonad parasite. Scanning electron micrograph. Arrows indicate anterior flagella and axostyle.
